meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the February 20, 2024 meeting of the Quality of Life, Arts and Culture Committee.

agenda_items.description: Discussion of the Mayor’s Memo Regarding Community Input Into the Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Policy Areas.

agenda_items.description: Presentation of survey results and recommendations regarding high impact areas.

agenda_items.title: Ordinance Amending Chapter 17
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 17, 'Food Establishments,' of the Dallas City Code.

agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for removal and disposal of scrap tires.
